Страв од Живи Мртовци Republic of Macedonia
Fear of The Walking Dead USA (working title)

1.title: What's Your Story?
1.plot: A lone traveler's wearying journey is interrupted by new acquaintances, some who become friend, others who become foe.

2.title: Another Day in the Diamond
2.plot: A troubled survivor finds allies in an unexpected place; the life Madison has fought to build comes under threat.

3.title: Good Out Here
3.plot: Madison and Morgan try to help Nick find inner peace; a quest for revenge exacts its toll on the group.

4.title: Buried
4.plot: Al's questioning uncovers some surprising truths about the group's past; John Dorie receives unexpected news.

5.title: Laura
5.plot: The arrival of a wounded visitor in John Dorie's life forces him to change his ways.

6.title: Just in Case
6.plot: Strand wrestles with Madison's decisions; things take an unexpected turn at the Stadium.

7.title: The Wrong Side of Where You Are Now
7.plot: Madison's decision to help an adversary has unintended consequences; John Dorie's life hangs in the balance.

8.title: No One's Gone
8.plot: Madison fights to preserve the life she worked so hard to build; Morgan tries to do the right thing.

9.title: People Like Us
9.plot: Morgan tries to help Alicia and this fractured group of survivors as a storm brews.

10.title: Close Your Eyes
10.plot: Alicia's forced to reckon with an agonizing past while seeking refuge from a storm.

11.title: The Code
11.plot: Morgan's journey is derailed by some new acquaintances.

12.title: Weak
12.plot: June helps when Al's health deteriorates; Morgan searches for friends lost in the storm.

13.title: Blackjack
13.plot: Strand and John are marooned; Luciana aids a man in need; The group's efforts to help a stranger puts everyone in danger.

14.title: MM 54
14.plot: Difficult decisions lead the group in uncertainty; Alicia delivers on a promise to Charlie.

15.title: I Lose People...
15.plot: The group's hope falters as they seek a way out; Alicia and Charlie reunite with friends.

16.title: ...I Lose Myself
16.plot: Morgan struggles to find the strength to help friends in dire need before it's too late.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: A highly dysfunctional blended family is forced together when they realize a reported virus is actually the onset of the undead apocalypse.

2.title: So Close, Yet So Far
2.plot: While Madison struggles to keep Nick from a crippling withdrawal, Travis ventures out to find his son before the city of Los Angeles falls.

3.title: The Dog
3.plot: After they escape a riot, Travis, Liza and Chris seek refuge with the Salazars; Madison defends her home.

4.title: Not Fade Away
4.plot: Madison and Travis see different sides of the National Guard's occupation in their neighborhood; the family tries to adapt to the new world.

5.title: Cobalt
5.plot: The National Guard's plan for the neighborhood is revealed; Travis and Madison make a difficult decision.

6.title: The Good Man
6.plot: With information Daniel retrieved from the guard he tortured, the three families attempt a dangerous rescue to free Nick and Liza so they can all leave town to find safety.

1.title: Monster
1.plot: Travis, Madison, and their blended family set sail on Strand's boat off the coast of California in an effort to escape the apocalypse. While they're looking for safety, they only find more trouble at sea.

2.title: We All Fall Down
2.plot: The group seeks shelter with a survivalist family. Madison tries to uncover the family's true motives. Meanwhile, Salazar works to discover Strand's intentions.

3.title: Ouroboros
3.plot: Madison confronts Strand about his mysterious destination. Meanwhile, Nick, Alicia and others inspect wreckage from a plane crash.

4.title: Blood in the Streets
4.plot: The group lets a family in distress board the Abigail. Strand's past begins to come to light. Nick looks for an associate of Strand's.

5.title: Captive
5.plot: Alicia works toward reuniting with her family. Travis comes across a familiar face. Madison and Nick try to save their family against all odds.

6.title: Sicut Cervus
6.plot: Conflict arises as the Abigail approaches its destination. Chris makes a staggering decision. Nick meets a new maternal figure.

7.title: Shiva
7.plot: The family faces their biggest test yet. Nick, Madison, Travis and others try to stay close to each other.

8.title: Grotesque
8.plot: Nick's steadfeast search for answers leads him into a deadly dog-eat-dog landscape. A dark piece of his past is uncovered.

9.title: Los Muertos
9.plot: Madison, Strand, and others move forward after the compound falls; Nick gets picked for a dangerous assignment.

10.title: Do Not Disturb
10.plot: Travis has a hard time connecting with Chris while looking for shelter; Alicia meets a woman with a bloody past.

11.title: Pablo & Jessica
11.plot: Alicia and Madison try to bring two competing factions together. Nick uses skills from his past for his new role.

12.title: Pillar of Salt
12.plot: At the Colonia, Alejandro reveals his darker side. A hotel resident becomes violent and Madison springs into action.

13.title: Date of Death
13.plot: Refugees begin flooding into the hotel the group is staying at, and they recognize a familiar face among them. Madison has a hard time dealing with the entire situation.

14.title: Wrath
14.plot: Travis is blindsided by new refugees at the hotel. Meanwhile, Nick must make the decision to leave the Colonia or stay with Luciana.

15.title: North
15.plot: Travis' rage causes unrest at the RBH. Madison must decide if she will stand by Travis. Nick takes on leadership of the Colonia as Narcos close in.

1.title: Eye of the Beholder
1.plot: The Clark family find themselves in a dire predicament and must work together to discover a path to safety.

2.title: The New Frontier
2.plot: Strand faces resistance as he attempts to hold power over his domain.

3.title: TEOTWAWKI
3.plot: Alicia and Nick fall in with new crowds. Madison discovers Otto's past mimics her own.

4.plot: A mysterious character searches for purpose and becomes tied to the struggle over a resource.

5.title: Burning in Water, Drowning in Flame
5.plot: An oncoming threat disrupts peace; Madison and Troy search for answers; Alicia must reconcile with her past.

6.title: Red Dirt
6.plot: News of danger spreads throughout the community as Madison struggles to keep everyone together.

7.title: The Unveiling
7.plot: A new arrival sows a divide within the ranch and Alicia forms a relationship to maintain peace.

8.title: Children of Wrath
8.plot: Madison must negotiate the terms of an agreement in the midst of ranch-wide turmoil; Nick and Alicia challenge their mother's motives.

9.title: Minotaur
9.plot: In the aftermath of the Clark family's actions, new leadership assumes control of the Ranch. Daniel assists Lola in the distribution of water.

10.title: The Diviner
10.plot: With the Ranch dangerously low on resources, Madison and Walker leave in search of a solution. Nick and Alicia struggle to keep the peace.

11.title: La Serpiente
11.plot: A mission is launched to replenish the Ranch's water supply by seeking help from another community.

12.title: Brother's Keeper
12.plot: Nick and Jake set out to handle a delicate situation while the Ranch prepare for a massive threat.

13.title: This Land Is Your Land
13.plot: Alicia is thrust into a position of leadership where she's forced to make life-changing decisions.

14.title: El Matadero
14.plot: Alicia encounters a potential ally. Ofelia fights for survival and Nick uses his skill set for profit.

15.title: Things Bad Begun
15.plot: Strand's motives are made clear when Nick discovers a new threat descending on the dam; Madison faces a horrifying revelation.

16.title: Sleigh Ride
16.plot: Strand's loyalty is tested when the dam clashes with an adversary. The Clark family is pushed to new extremes as Madison reckons with her past.

locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(pilot) (several parts of season 1)
El Sereno, Los Angeles, California, USA::(Location season 1)
Dell Diamond Stadium - 3400 East Palm Valley Blvd., Round Rock, Texas, USA::(Season 4 baseball stadium location)
imdb.plot outline: Spin off series of The Walking Dead that portrays the beginning events of the zombie apocalypse in the West coast during the same time frame when the city of Atlanta was falling under attack, while Rick was in a coma at the local hospital. It shows how the strain was already in full effect in the south while it's just starting in California.
imdb.title: Fear the Walking Dead
plot: A Walking Dead spin-off, set in Los Angeles, following two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Spin off series of The Walking Dead that portrays the beginning events of the zombie apocalypse in the West coast during the same time frame when the city of Atlanta was falling under attack, while Rick was in a coma at the local hospital. It shows how the strain was already in full effect in the south while it's just starting in California.

Living in the same universe as The Walking Dead, _Fear the Walking Dead_ (qv) is a gritty drama that explores the onset of the undead apocalypse through the lens of a fractured family. Set in a city where people come to escape, shield secrets, and bury their pasts, a mysterious outbreak threatens to disrupt what little stability high school guidance counselor Madison Clark and English teacher Travis Manawa have managed to assemble. The everyday pressure of blending two families while dealing with resentful, escapist, and strung out children takes a back seat when society begins to break down. A forced evolution, a necessary survival of the fittest takes hold, and our dysfunctional family must either reinvent themselves or embrace their darker histories.

camera: Arri Alexa XT Plus, Panavision G-, T-Series, PVintage and Hawk V-Lite Vintage '74 Lenses
